summary:
What might’ve worked five years ago doesn’t work so well today. Copy-pasting a marketing strategy year after year is doomed to fail. You might be looking to reshape the way you do things. Perhaps your brand story is outdated, or you’re making a pivot and facing a new audience. This requires a new way of saying things – like an autocorrect for your marketing efforts. A copywriter can help you with that.

Customers are no longer looking for why YOU are amazing, they are looking for what you can DO for THEM. It’s no longer about you.

-- WHAT DO YOU MEAN? IT’S OUR BRAND, RIGHT? --

Absolutely! And it will definitely stay that way. But – and here’s the kicker – it’s about your customers too. They make your brand what it truly is. What they say about your brand when you’re not in the room is exactly how they remember the story you tell.

-- LET'S GET YOU THE COPY YOUR BRAND DESERVES --

Lost in the marketing jungle? You’ve come to the right place if you’re looking for a package full of copy which is so awesome, it helps you navigate the path you’re on – or willing to take – and avoid any pitfalls.

--WHAT DO YOU DO?--

I help B2C and B2B brands generate leads with straightforward and credible copy so they can connect with their ideal customer.

Together we can work to reach both the B2B and B2C market to put your product and service on the map. I’m not here to write a novel, I’m here to craft copy for your website with surgical precision. Precision that leads to more sales, and a satisfied audience.

- Looking to make informed marketing decisions?

- Wishing for solid customer data?

- Wanting to transform the 'huh' into the 'wow'?!

Waste no more TIME and MONEY and upgrade your brand. 

By harnessing your story, identifying your USP’s, and researching your product and audience, I’ll help you create messaging that hits you right in the feels.

Head on over to www.danielgoene.com and together we’ll breathe life back into your brand.

profile_positions.description:
The Liberty in Augmentation Foundation (LiA) is a pro-transhumanism NGO that supports the active development of prosthetics and bionics and stands strong to allow you to live your life without fear of limitation.

There are four main pillars of focus:

Freedom of choice - 
Our bodies are our own. Just like we can decide what job we apply for, what college we want to join, we should be able to decide what we do with our bodies. If the situation warrants an amputation to put an end to your chronic pain, who has the right to deny you that? 

Raise subsidies for bionics research -
We believe that the human body has been a strong foundation that got us to where we are now. However, to improve our prosthetics we need to have higher subsidies for bionics research so that we can create more life-like limbs and organs and give everyone the chance to live their life to the fullest, and possibly even more comfortably than with a biological limb. 

Reduce medical insurance costs -
Currently, the US, Luxembourg, and Switzerland rank highest in medical bills and it is only rising further. To give every amputee on this planet a fair chance to have a prosthetic, we need to create more comfortable payment plans, reduce production costs, and make insurers look at the patient's unique circumstances thereby avoiding a generalized solution.

Increase awareness about prosthetics - 
People that have recently lost a limb, for example, soldiers, are often written and spoken about but quickly forgotten. It's the phase that happens after the amputation and the initial grief that the world needs to learn about. The financial troubles that come with a prosthetic, the pain, the suppression of that pain with drugs, and the constant feeling of being 'looked at' are common issues. We aim to bring this to light around the world, and that these people need our help and care.
